server.name: io.github.rogiervdbrnk/mcp-real-estate-server
server.description: MCP server for Dutch real estate data including BAG registry, energy labels, and zoning info.

environmentVariables.description: API key for Dutch BAG (Building and Address Registry) access - required for building data queries
environmentVariables.name: BAG_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: API key for Dutch energy label database access - required for energy efficiency data
environmentVariables.name: ENERGY_LABEL_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Database connection URL for authentication and usage tracking features
environmentVariables.name: DATABASE_URL
